title: Alejandro Sánchez Gómez
text:
Hi there!
I am Alejandro Sánchez Gómez, from Madrid (Spain).
I work as Predoctoral Researcher in University of Alcalá (UAH). My background is on Environmental Sciences, with a Masters´ Degree in Hydrology and Water Resources Management.
I work on Hydrological modelling with process based models, concretely SWAT+. I like working and exploring data, mostly using R. In my free time I like practising outdoors sports, travelling, and exploring nature.
In this page you will find publications and projects in which I have been involved.

title: Alejandro Sánchez Gómez
text:
